Two Brides and a Baby  bụ ihe nkiri ihunanya Naịjirịa 2011 nke Teco Benson duziri ma gosiputa Keira Hewatch, Kalu Ikeagwu,OC Ukeje, Chelsea Eze, Stella Damasus-Aboderin na Okey Uzoeshi
Ọ natara ihe nrite na nhọpụta na Africa Movie Academy Awards, Best of Nollywood Awards na Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Keche ( Keira Hewatch ) na Bankole ( OC Ukeje ) kwenyere na mmekọrịta ha bụ nke Chineke zubere
Ha na-eme atụmatụ ime mmemme agbamakwụkwọ dị ịtụnanya ma kwenyere na alụmdi na nwunye ha ga-adịru
A na-ekpughe ihe omume a na-atụghị anya nke na-anwale ọganihu alụmdi na nwunye ha.
Ihe nkiri a nwere ọkwa 43% ugbu a na Nollywood Reinvented na nkwubi okwu na "...ọ bụ ihe nkiri dị egwu, ọ naghị emegharị mmetụta uche n'ụzọ ọ bụla

Otú ọ dị, ọ bụrụ na i lee ya anya n'ụdị ntọala nke ihe anyị na-atụ anya ya na mmepụta Nollywood, ọ na-eme ka ihe nkiri ahụ bụrụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị karị."  YNaija toro ihe nkiri ahụ wee kwubie na "ihe nkiri a nwere mmasị karịa ihụrụ n'anya

Ọ na-egosi na site n'aka nri, Nollywood nwere ike mee ihe nkiri dị mma, nke a bụkwa ihe nkiri mara mma n'ezie." Otú ọ dị, ọ kpọpụtara ihe omume yoruba nke Deji ( Kalu Ikeagwu ) dị ka naanị ihe na adịghị mma na ihe nkiri a
Amarachukwu Iwuala nke Entertainment Express katọrọ ntụzịaka ahụ ma chee na etinyeghị nlebara anya nke ọma n'ọtụtụ nkọwa dị mkpa nke ihe nkiri ahụ
Dami Elebe nke Connect Nigeria toro atụmatụ, ime ihe na mmepụta ihe mana ọ chere na mmezi na nhazi kwesịrị ịka mma
